attributes.action: Public inquiry into apparent conflict of interest - Winsor, May & Hutton
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is to ask for a public enquiry into the following apparent conflict of interests:

Tom Winsor "independant review of policing & his companies links to G4S

http://johndehayes.wordpress.com/2012/05/12/independent-review-i-dont-think-so-mr-winsor/

Tom Winsors' application to become a HMIC

http://www.policeoracle.com/news/Police+Performance/2012/May/22/Tom-Winsor-Has-Applied-To-Become-HMIC-Chief-_48916.html

Theresa Mays' financial links to G4S

http://www.publications.parliament.uk/pa/cm199899/cmregmem/memil9.htm
http://www.g4s.com/en/Investors/Investor%20Relations%20Information/Major%20Shareholdings/

And Lord Hutton financially profitting from his review of public sector pensions by being the chairman to MyCSP

http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-17890248
